name: Drilla: idle digging gold mine
description:
Drilla — is an interactive strategy game that will immerse you into the world of excavations and explorations. Do you think it’s easy being a geologist, chemist, engineer, constructor, and handy miner? Why don’t you try it out?! Develop a powerful drill and get to the center of the earth!

Key features:
Simple to learn;
Drill upgrade — collect the best body kit from over 200 available;
Automatic drilling even when you aren’t in the game — drilling and mining continues until the Drilla power block is depleted;
International rating — become the best driller in the world;
Clan system. Create your own clan or join an already existing one. Your clan will help you figure out a good strategy and may share resources;
Assistants — get a special tech helper and drill faster;
Build blocks and a block tower, solving the puzzle;
Daily bonuses to all players;
Augmented reality game mode (iOS 11 and ARKit support: iPhone SE, 6S and newer)

And sometimes, you’ll be visited by Egor...

Something wrong? Don’t hesitate to write us at: mail@blackbears.mobi
Do you enjoy being the drill master? We’d be happy to see your review!
